◆ _IsWithinDist()

bool WorldObject::_IsWithinDist ( WorldObject const *  obj,
float  dist2compare,
bool  is3D,
bool  useBoundingRadius = true 
) const
privatevirtual

Reimplemented in GameObject.

1209{
1210 float sizefactor = useBoundingRadius ? GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize() : 0.0f;
1211 float maxdist = dist2compare + sizefactor;
1212
1213 if (m_transport && obj->GetTransport() && obj->GetTransport()->GetGUID() == m_transport->GetGUID())
1214 {
1215 float dtx = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX;
1216 float dty = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY;
1217 float disttsq = dtx * dtx + dty * dty;
1218 if (is3D)
1219 {
1220 float dtz = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ;
1221 disttsq += dtz * dtz;
1222 }
1223 return disttsq < (maxdist * maxdist);
1224 }
1225
1226 float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1227 float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1228 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1229 if (is3D)
1230 {
1231 float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1232 distsq += dz * dz;
1233 }
1234
1235 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1236}

◆ AddToNotify()

void WorldObject::AddToNotify ( uint16  f)
2893{
2894 if (!(m_notifyflags & f))
2895 if (Unit* u = ToUnit())
2896 {
2897 if (f & NOTIFY_VISIBILITY_CHANGED)
2898 {
2899 uint32 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetVisibilityNotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 1000;
2900
2901 uint32 diff = getMSTimeDiff(u->m_last_notify_mstime, GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count());
2902 if (diff >= EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY / 2)
2903 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY /= 2;
2904 else
2905 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY -= diff;
2906 u->m_delayed_unit_relocation_timer = EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY;
2907 u->m_last_notify_mstime = GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() + EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY - 1;
2908 }
2909 else if (f & NOTIFY_AI_RELOCATION)
2910 {
2911 u->m_delayed_unit_ai_notify_timer = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetAINotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 500;
2912 }
2913
2914 m_notifyflags |= f;
2915 }
2916}

◆ CanDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  ignoreStealth,
bool  checkClient,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private
1867{
1868 WorldObject const* seer = this;
1869
1870 // Pets don't have detection, they use the detection of their masters
1871 if (Unit const* thisUnit = ToUnit())
1872 if (Unit* controller = thisUnit->GetCharmerOrOwner())
1873 seer = controller;
1874
1875 if (obj->IsAlwaysDetectableFor(seer) || GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER) // xinef: World Trigger can detect all objects, used for wild gameobjects without owner!
1876 return true;
1877
1878 if (!ignoreStealth)
1879 {
1880 if (!seer->CanDetectInvisibilityOf(obj)) // xinef: added ignoreStealth, allow AoE spells to hit invisible targets!
1881 return false;
1882
1883 if (!seer->CanDetectStealthOf(obj, checkAlert))
1884 {
1885 // xinef: ignore units players have at client, this cant be cheated!
1886 if (checkClient)
1887 {
1888 if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !ToPlayer()->HaveAtClient(obj))
1889 return false;
1890 }
1891 else
1892 return false;
1893 }
1894 }
1895
1896 return true;
1897}

◆ CanDetectInvisibilityOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectInvisibilityOf ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
private
1900{
1901 uint32 mask = obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
1902 // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
1903 mask |= obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibility.GetFlags();
1904
1905 // Check for not detected types
1906 if (mask != obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags())
1907 return false;
1908
1909 // It isn't possible in invisibility to detect something that can't detect the invisible object
1910 // (it's at least true for spell: 66)
1911 // It seems like that only Units are affected by this check (couldn't see arena doors with preparation invisibility)
1912 if (obj->ToUnit())
1913 {
1914 uint32 objMask = m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
1915 // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
1916 objMask |= m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags();
1917 if (objMask != m_invisibility.GetFlags())
1918 return false;
1919 }
1920
1921 for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES; ++i)
1922 {
1923 if (!(mask & (1 << i)))
1924 continue;
1925
1926 // xinef: visible for the same invisibility type:
1927 if (m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)) && obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)))
1928 continue;
1929
1930 int32 objInvisibilityValue = obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
1931 int32 ownInvisibilityDetectValue = m_invisibilityDetect.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
1932
1933 // Too low value to detect
1934 if (ownInvisibilityDetectValue < objInvisibilityValue)
1935 return false;
1936 }
1937
1938 return true;
1939}
int32
std::int32_t int32
Definition: Define.h:104
InvisibilityType
InvisibilityType
Definition: SharedDefines.h:1226
TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES

Definition: SharedDefines.h:1240

Definition: Object.h:354

Definition: Object.h:359

References FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetFlags(), FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetValue(), m_invisibility, m_invisibilityDetect, TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES, and Object::ToUnit().

◆ CanDetectStealthOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectStealthOf ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private
1942{
1943 // Combat reach is the minimal distance (both in front and behind),
1944 // and it is also used in the range calculation.
1945 // One stealth point increases the visibility range by 0.3 yard.
1946
1947 if (!obj->m_stealth.GetFlags())
1948 return true;
1949
1950 // dead players shouldnt be able to detect stealth on arenas
1951 if (isType(TYPEMASK_PLAYER))
1952 if (!ToPlayer()->IsAlive())
1953 return false;
1954
1955 float distance = GetExactDist(obj);
1956 float combatReach = 0.0f;
1957
1958 if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT))
1959 combatReach = ((Unit*)this)->GetCombatReach();
1960
1961 if (distance < combatReach)
1962 return true;
1963
1964 if (!HasInArc(M_PI, obj))
1965 return false;
1966
1967 for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES; ++i)
1968 {
1969 if (!(obj->m_stealth.GetFlags() & (1 << i)))
1970 continue;
1971
1972 if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT))
1973 if (((Unit*)this)->HasAuraTypeWithMiscvalue(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, i))
1974 return true;
1975
1976 // Starting points
1977 int32 detectionValue = 30;
1978
1979 // Level difference: 5 point / level, starting from level 1.
1980 // There may be spells for this and the starting points too, but
1981 // not in the DBCs of the client.
1982 detectionValue += int32(getLevelForTarget(obj) - 1) * 5;
1983
1984 // Apply modifiers
1985 detectionValue += m_stealthDetect.GetValue(StealthType(i));
1986 if (obj->isType(TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT))
1987 {
1988 detectionValue += 30; // pussywizard: increase detection range for gameobjects (ie. traps)
1989 if (Unit* owner = ((GameObject*)obj)->GetOwner())
1990 detectionValue -= int32(owner->getLevelForTarget(this) - 1) * 5;
1991 }
1992
1993 detectionValue -= obj->m_stealth.GetValue(StealthType(i));
1994
1995 // Calculate max distance
1996 float visibilityRange = float(detectionValue) * 0.3f + combatReach;
1997
1998 Unit const* unit = ToUnit();
1999
2000 // If this unit is an NPC then player detect range doesn't apply
2001 if (unit && unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && visibilityRange > MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE)
2002 visibilityRange = MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE;
2003
2004 if (checkAlert)
2005 visibilityRange += (visibilityRange * 0.08f) + 1.5f;
2006
2007 Unit const* targetUnit = obj->ToUnit();
2008
2009 // If checking for alert, and creature's visibility range is greater than aggro distance, No alert
2010 if (checkAlert && unit && unit->ToCreature() && visibilityRange >= unit->ToCreature()->GetAttackDistance(targetUnit) + unit->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance)
2011 return false;
2012
2013 if (distance > visibilityRange)
2014 return false;
2015 }
2016
2017 return true;
2018}
TYPEMASK_UNIT
@ TYPEMASK_UNIT
Definition: ObjectGuid.h:51
TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT
@ TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT
Definition: ObjectGuid.h:53
TYPEMASK_PLAYER
@ TYPEMASK_PLAYER
Definition: ObjectGuid.h:52
MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE
#define MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE
Definition: Unit.h:1239
SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
@ SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
Definition: SpellAuraDefines.h:291
StealthType
StealthType
Definition: SharedDefines.h:1218
TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES
@ TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES
Definition: SharedDefines.h:1222
Creature::GetAttackDistance
float GetAttackDistance(Unit const *player) const
Definition: Creature.cpp:3580
Creature::m_CombatDistance
float m_CombatDistance
Definition: Creature.h:355
GameObject
Definition: GameObject.h:813
Object::isType
bool isType(uint16 mask) const
Definition: Object.h:122
Object::ToCreature
Creature * ToCreature()
Definition: Object.h:197
WorldObject::m_stealthDetect
FlaggedValuesArray32< int32, uint32, StealthType, TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES > m_stealthDetect
Definition: Object.h:504
WorldObject::m_stealth
FlaggedValuesArray32< int32, uint32, StealthType, TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES > m_stealth
Definition: Object.h:503
WorldObject::getLevelForTarget
virtual uint8 getLevelForTarget(WorldObject const *) const
Definition: Object.h:486
Position::GetExactDist
float GetExactDist(float x, float y, float z) const
Definition: Position.h:178
Position::HasInArc
bool HasInArc(float arcangle, const Position *pos, float targetRadius=0.0f) const
Definition: Position.cpp:140

References Creature::GetAttackDistance(), Position::GetExactDist(), FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetFlags(), getLevelForTarget(), Object::GetTypeId(), FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetValue(), Position::HasInArc(), Object::isType(), Creature::m_CombatDistance, m_stealth, m_stealthDetect, MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE, SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, Object::ToCreature(), Object::ToPlayer(), TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES, Object::ToUnit(), TYPEID_PLAYER, TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT, TYPEMASK_PLAYER, and TYPEMASK_UNIT.

Referenced by CanDetect().

◆ CanNeverSee()

bool WorldObject::CanNeverSee ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
private
1860{
1861 if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && obj->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1862 return GetMap() != obj->GetMap() || (!InSamePhase(obj) && ToUnit()->GetVehicleBase() != obj && this != obj->ToUnit()->GetVehicleBase());
1863 return GetMap() != obj->GetMap() || !InSamePhase(obj);
1864}

◆ CanSeeOrDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanSeeOrDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  ignoreStealth = false,
bool  distanceCheck = false,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
1729{
1730 if (this == obj)
1731 return true;
1732
1733 if (obj->IsNeverVisible() || CanNeverSee(obj))
1734 return false;
1735
1736 if (obj->IsAlwaysVisibleFor(this) || CanAlwaysSee(obj))
1737 return true;
1738
1739 // Creature scripts
1740 if (Creature const* cObj = obj->ToCreature())
1741 {
1742 if (Player const* player = this->ToPlayer())
1743 {
1744 if (cObj->IsAIEnabled && !cObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(player))
1745 {
1746 return false;
1747 }
1748
1749 ConditionList conditions = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForNotGroupedEntry(CONDITION_SOURCE_TYPE_CREATURE_VISIBILITY, cObj->GetEntry());
1750
1751 if (!sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions((WorldObject*)this, conditions))
1752 {
1753 return false;
1754 }
1755 }
1756 }
1757
1758 // Gameobject scripts
1759 if (GameObject const* goObj = obj->ToGameObject())
1760 if (this->ToPlayer() && !goObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(this->ToPlayer()))
1761 return false;
1762
1763 // pussywizard: arena spectator
1764 if (obj->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1765 if (((Player const*)obj)->IsSpectator() && ((Player const*)obj)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena())
1766 return false;
1767
1768 bool corpseVisibility = false;
1769 if (distanceCheck)
1770 {
1771 bool corpseCheck = false;
1772 WorldObject const* viewpoint = this;
1773 if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1774 {
1775 if (thisPlayer->isDead() && thisPlayer->GetHealth() > 0 && // Cheap way to check for ghost state
1776 !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST))
1777 {
1778 if (Corpse* corpse = thisPlayer->GetCorpse())
1779 {
1780 corpseCheck = true;
1781 if (corpse->IsWithinDist(thisPlayer, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1782 if (corpse->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1783 corpseVisibility = true;
1784 }
1785 }
1786
1787 // our additional checks
1788 if (Unit const* target = obj->ToUnit())
1789 {
1790 // xinef: don't allow to detect vehicle accessory if you can't see vehicle base!
1791 if (Unit const* vehicle = target->GetVehicleBase())
1792 if (!thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(vehicle))
1793 return false;
1794
1795 // pussywizard: during arena preparation, don't allow to detect pets if can't see its owner (spoils enemy arena frames)
1796 if (target->IsPet() && target->GetOwnerGUID() && target->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && GetGUID() != target->GetOwnerGUID())
1797 if (BattlegroundMap* bgmap = target->FindMap()->ToBattlegroundMap())
1798 if (Battleground* bg = bgmap->GetBG())
1799 if (bg->GetStatus() < STATUS_IN_PROGRESS && !thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(target->GetOwnerGUID()))
1800 return false;
1801 }
1802
1803 if (thisPlayer->GetViewpoint())
1804 viewpoint = thisPlayer->GetViewpoint();
1805
1806 if (thisPlayer->GetFarSightDistance() && !thisPlayer->isInFront(obj))
1807 {
1808 return false;
1809 }
1810 }
1811
1812 // Xinef: check reversely obj vs viewpoint, object could be a gameObject which overrides _IsWithinDist function to include gameobject size
1813 if (!corpseCheck && !viewpoint->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), true))
1814 return false;
1815 }
1816
1817 // GM visibility off or hidden NPC
1818 if (!obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1819 {
1820 // Stop checking other things for GMs
1821 if (m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1822 return true;
1823 }
1824 else
1825 return m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM) >= obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM);
1826
1827 // Ghost players, Spirit Healers, and some other NPCs
1828 if (!corpseVisibility && !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST)))
1829 {
1830 // Alive players can see dead players in some cases, but other objects can't do that
1831 if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1832 {
1833 if (Player const* objPlayer = obj->ToPlayer())
1834 {
1835 if (thisPlayer->GetTeamId() != objPlayer->GetTeamId() || !thisPlayer->IsGroupVisibleFor(objPlayer))
1836 return false;
1837 }
1838 else
1839 return false;
1840 }
1841 else
1842 return false;
1843 }
1844
1845 if (obj->IsInvisibleDueToDespawn())
1846 return false;
1847
1848 // pussywizard: arena spectator
1849 if (this->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1850 if (((Player const*)this)->IsSpectator() && ((Player const*)this)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && (obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() || obj->m_stealth.GetFlags()))
1851 return false;
1852
1853 if (!CanDetect(obj, ignoreStealth, !distanceCheck, checkAlert))
1854 return false;
1855
1856 return true;
1857}
STATUS_IN_PROGRESS
@ STATUS_IN_PROGRESS

◆ DestroyForNearbyPlayers()

void WorldObject::DestroyForNearbyPlayers ( )
Todo:
: this is for puppet
2859{
2860 if (!IsInWorld())
2861 return;
2862
2863 std::list<Player*> targets;
2864 Acore::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck check(this, GetVisibilityRange() + VISIBILITY_COMPENSATION, false);
2865 Acore::PlayerListSearcherWithSharedVision<Acore::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(this, targets, check);
2866 Cell::VisitWorldObjects(this, searcher, GetVisibilityRange());
2867 for (std::list<Player*>::const_iterator iter = targets.begin(); iter != targets.end(); ++iter)
2868 {
2869 Player* player = (*iter);
2870
2871 if (player == this)
2872 continue;
2873
2874 if (!player->HaveAtClient(this))
2875 continue;
2876
2877 if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT) && ((Unit*)this)->GetCharmerGUID() == player->GetGUID())
2878 continue;
2879
2880 DestroyForPlayer(player);
2881 player->m_clientGUIDs.erase(GetGUID());
2882 }
2883}

2648{

2655 y = this->GetPositionY();
2656 z = this->GetPositionZ();
2657 if (forWho)

2659 u->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2660 }

2662 if (GetExactDistSq(x, y, z) >= maxDist * maxDist)
2663 {
2664 if (force)
2665 {
2666 x = this->GetPositionX();
2667 y = this->GetPositionY();
2668 z = this->GetPositionZ();
2669 return true;
2670 }
2671 return false;
2672 }
2673 return true;

◆ GetDistanceOrder()

bool WorldObject::GetDistanceOrder ( WorldObject const *  obj1,
WorldObject const *  obj2,
bool  is3D = true 
) const
1384{
1385 float dx1 = GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX();
1386 float dy1 = GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY();
1387 float distsq1 = dx1 * dx1 + dy1 * dy1;
1388 if (is3D)
1389 {
1390 float dz1 = GetPositionZ() - obj1->GetPositionZ();
1391 distsq1 += dz1 * dz1;
1392 }
1393
1394 float dx2 = GetPositionX() - obj2->GetPositionX();
1395 float dy2 = GetPositionY() - obj2->GetPositionY();
1396 float distsq2 = dx2 * dx2 + dy2 * dy2;
1397 if (is3D)
1398 {
1399 float dz2 = GetPositionZ() - obj2->GetPositionZ();
1400 distsq2 += dz2 * dz2;
1401 }
1402
1403 return distsq1 < distsq2;
1404}

References Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by Acore::ObjectDistanceOrderPred::operator()(), Spell::SearchChainTargets(), and boss_selin_fireheart::boss_selin_fireheartAI::SelectNearestCrystal().

◆ GetDistanceZ()

float WorldObject::GetDistanceZ ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
1201{
1202 float dz = std::fabs(GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ());
1203 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1204 float dist = dz - sizefactor;
1205 return (dist > 0 ? dist : 0);
1206}

References GetObjectSize(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

◆ GetFirstCollisionPosition() [1/3]

Position WorldObject::GetFirstCollisionPosition ( float  destX,
float  destY,
float  destZ 
)
2785{
2786 Position pos = GetPosition();
2787 auto distance = GetExactDistSq(destX,destY,destZ);
2788
2789 auto dx = destX - pos.GetPositionX();
2790 auto dy = destY - pos.GetPositionY();
2791
2792 auto ang = std::atan2(dy, dx);
2793 ang = (ang >= 0) ? ang : 2 * M_PI + ang;
2794
2795 MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, distance, ang);
2796 return pos;
2797}

)
2770{

2772 auto dy = destY - startY;

◆ GetHitSpherePointFor() [2/2]

Position WorldObject::GetHitSpherePointFor ( Position const &  dest,
Optional< float >  collisionHeight = { } 
) const
1239{
1240 G3D::Vector3 vThis(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ() + (collisionHeight ? *collisionHeight : GetCollisionHeight()));

◆ GetMinHeightInWater()

float WorldObject::GetMinHeightInWater ( ) const

Get the minimum height of a object that should be in water to start floating/swim.

Returns
float
1546{
1547 // have a fun with Archimedes' formula
1548 auto height = GetCollisionHeight();
1549 auto width = GetCollisionWidth();
1550 auto weight = getWeight(height, width, 1040); // avg human specific weight
1551 auto heightOutOfWater = getOutOfWater(width, weight, 10202) * 4.0f; // avg human density
1552 auto heightInWater = height - heightOutOfWater;
1553 return (height > heightInWater ? heightInWater : (height - (height / 3)));
1554}
getWeight
float getWeight(float height, float width, float specificWeight)
Definition: Physics.h:34
getOutOfWater

Get the height immersed in water.
Definition: Physics.h:49

◆ GetNearPoint()

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float &  z,
float  searcher_size,
float  distance2d,
float  absAngle,
float  controlZ = 0,
Position const *  startPos = nullptr 
) const
2575{
2576 GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle, startPos);
2577 z = GetPositionZ();
2578
2579 if (searcher)
2580 {
2581 if (Unit const* unit = searcher->ToUnit(); Unit const* target = ToUnit())
2582 {
2583 if (unit && target && unit->IsInWater() && target->IsInWater())
2584 {
2585 // if the searcher is in water
2586 // we have no ground so we can
2587 // set the target height to the
2588 // z-coord to keep the searcher
2589 // at the correct height (face to face)
2590 z += GetCollisionHeight() - unit->GetCollisionHeight();
2591 }
2592 }
2593 searcher->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2594 }
2595 else
2596 {
2597 UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2598 }
2599
2600 // if detection disabled, return first point
2601 if (!sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_DETECT_POS_COLLISION))
2602 return;
2603
2604 // return if the point is already in LoS
2605 if (!controlZ && IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2606 return;
2607
2608 // remember first point
2609 float first_x = x;
2610 float first_y = y;
2611 float first_z = z;
2612
2613 // loop in a circle to look for a point in LoS using small steps
2614 for (float angle = float(M_PI) / 8; angle < float(M_PI) * 2; angle += float(M_PI) / 8)
2615 {
2616 GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle + angle, startPos);
2617 z = GetPositionZ();
2618 UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2619 if (controlZ && fabsf(GetPositionZ() - z) > controlZ)
2620 continue;
2621
2622 if (IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2623 return;
2624 }
2625
2626 // still not in LoS, give up and return first position found
2627 if (startPos)
2628 {
2629 x = searcher->GetPositionX();
2630 y = searcher->GetPositionY();
2631 z = searcher->GetPositionZ();
2632 }
2633 else
2634 {
2635 x = first_x;
2636 y = first_y;
2637 z = first_z;
2638 }
2639}
CONFIG_DETECT_POS_COLLISION
@ CONFIG_DETECT_POS_COLLISION
Definition: IWorld.h:113
sWorld
#define sWorld
Definition: World.h:458

Definition: Object.cpp:1556

◆ GetNearPoint2D() [2/2]

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint2D ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float  distance,
float  absAngle,
Position const *  startPos = nullptr 
) const
2538{
2539 float effectiveReach = GetCombatReach();
2540
2541 if (searcher)
2542 {
2543 effectiveReach += searcher->GetCombatReach();
2544
2545 if (this != searcher)
2546 {
2547 float myHover = 0.0f, searcherHover = 0.0f;
2548 if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
2549 myHover = unit->GetHoverHeight();
2550 if (Unit const* searchUnit = searcher->ToUnit())
2551 searcherHover = searchUnit->GetHoverHeight();
2552
2553 float hoverDelta = myHover - searcherHover;
2554 if (hoverDelta != 0.0f)
2555 effectiveReach = std::sqrt(std::max(effectiveReach * effectiveReach - hoverDelta * hoverDelta, 0.0f));
2556 }
2557 }
2558
2559 float positionX = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionX() : GetPositionX();
2560 float positionY = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionY() : GetPositionY();
2561
2562 x = positionX + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::cos(absAngle);
2563 y = positionY + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::sin(absAngle);
2564
2565 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(x);
2566 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(y);
2567}

void NormalizeMapCoord(float &c)

) const
1505{
1506 if (!distance)
1507 {
1508 pos.GetPosition(rand_x, rand_y, rand_z);
1509 return;
1510 }
1511
1512 // angle to face `obj` to `this`
1513 float angle = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(2 * M_PI);
1514 float new_dist = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(distance);
1515

◆ IsInBetween()

bool WorldObject::IsInBetween ( WorldObject const *  obj1,
WorldObject const *  obj2,
float  size = 0 
) const
1473{
1474 if (!obj1 || !obj2)
1475 return false;
1476
1477 if (!size)
1478 size = GetObjectSize() / 2;
1479
1480 float pdist = obj1->GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) + size / 2.0f;
1481 if (GetExactDist2dSq(obj1) >= pdist || GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) >= pdist)
1482 return false;
1483
1484 if (G3D::fuzzyEq(obj1->GetPositionX(), obj2->GetPositionX()))
1485 return GetPositionX() >= obj1->GetPositionX() - size && GetPositionX() <= obj1->GetPositionX() + size;
1486
1487 float A = (obj2->GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY()) / (obj2->GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX());
1488 float B = -1;
1489 float C = obj1->GetPositionY() - A * obj1->GetPositionX();
1490 float dist = std::fabs(A * GetPositionX() + B * GetPositionY() + C) / std::sqrt(A * A + B * B);
1491 return dist <= size;
1492}
Position::GetExactDist2dSq
float GetExactDist2dSq(const float x, const float y) const
Definition: Position.h:157

References Position::GetExactDist2dSq(), GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), and Position::GetPositionY().

Referenced by TwilightCutterSelector::operator()().

◆ IsInRange()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange ( WorldObject const *  obj,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange,
bool  is3D = true 
) const
1407{
1408 float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1409 float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1410 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1411 if (is3D)
1412 {
1413 float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1414 distsq += dz * dz;
1415 }
1416
1417 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1418
1419 // check only for real range
1420 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1421 {
1422 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1423 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1424 return false;
1425 }
1426
1427 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1428 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1429}

References GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by SmartScript::GetTargets(), npc_anachronos_the_ancient::npc_anachronos_the_ancientAI::HandleAnimation(), npc_shay_leafrunner::npc_shay_leafrunnerAI::MoveInLineOfSight(), HammerOfJusticeSelector::operator()(), SmartScript::ProcessEvent(), npc_varian_wrynn::npc_varian_wrynnAI::UpdateAI(), npc_thrall_bfu::npc_thrall_bfuAI::UpdateAI(), npc_shay_leafrunner::npc_shay_leafrunnerAI::UpdateAI(), and boss_grand_champion::boss_grand_championAI::UpdateAI().

1452{

1466 }

◆ IsWithinLOS()

bool WorldObject::IsWithinLOS ( float  x,
float  y,
float  z,
VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags  ignoreFlags = VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags::Nothing,
LineOfSightChecks  checks = LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS 
) const
1329{
1330 if (IsInWorld())
1331 {
1332 oz += GetCollisionHeight();
1333 float x, y, z;
1334 if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1335 {
1336 GetPosition(x, y, z);
1337 z += GetCollisionHeight();
1338 }
1339 else
1340 {
1341 GetHitSpherePointFor({ ox, oy, oz }, x, y, z);
1342 }
1343
1344 return GetMap()->isInLineOfSight(x, y, z, ox, oy, oz, GetPhaseMask(), checks, ignoreFlags);
1345 }
1346 return true;
1347}

◆ IsWithinLOSInMap()

bool WorldObject::IsWithinLOSInMap ( WorldObject const *  obj,
VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags  ignoreFlags = VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags::Nothing,
LineOfSightChecks  checks = LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS,
Optional< float >  collisionHeight = { } 
) const
1350{
1351 if (!IsInMap(obj))
1352 return false;
1353
1354 float ox, oy, oz;
1355 if (obj->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1356 {
1357 obj->GetPosition(ox, oy, oz);
1358 oz += obj->GetCollisionHeight();
1359 }
1360 else
1361 obj->GetHitSpherePointFor({ GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ() + (collisionHeight ? *collisionHeight : GetCollisionHeight()) }, ox, oy, oz);
1362
1363 float x, y, z;
1364 if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1365 {
1366 GetPosition(x, y, z);
1367 z += GetCollisionHeight();
1368 }
1369 else
1370 GetHitSpherePointFor({ obj->GetPositionX(), obj->GetPositionY(), obj->GetPositionZ() + obj->GetCollisionHeight() }, x, y, z, collisionHeight);
1371
1372 return GetMap()->isInLineOfSight(x, y, z, ox, oy, oz, GetPhaseMask(), checks, ignoreFlags);

◆ MovePosition()

void WorldObject::MovePosition ( Position &  pos,
float  dist,
float  angle 
)
2725{
2726 angle += GetOrientation();
2727 float destx, desty, destz, ground, floor;
2728 destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2729 desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * std::sin(angle);
2730
2731 // Prevent invalid coordinates here, position is unchanged
2732 if (!Acore::IsValidMapCoord(destx, desty))
2733 {
2734 LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "WorldObject::MovePosition invalid coordinates X: {} and Y: {} were passed!", destx, desty);
2735 return;
2736 }
2737
2738 ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2739 floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2740 destz = std::fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= std::fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2741
2742 float step = dist / 10.0f;
2743
2744 for (uint8 j = 0; j < 10; ++j)
2745 {
2746 // do not allow too big z changes
2747 if (std::fabs(pos.m_positionZ - destz) > 6.0f)
2748 {
2749 destx -= step * cos(angle);
2750 desty -= step * std::sin(angle);
2751 ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2752 floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2753 destz = std::fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= std::fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2754 }
2755 // we have correct destz now
2756 else
2757 {
2758 pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);
2759 break;
2760 }
2761 }
2762
2763 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionX);
2764 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionY);
2765 UpdateGroundPositionZ(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ);
2766 pos.SetOrientation(GetOrientation());
2767}
uint8
std::uint8_t uint8

◆ MovePositionToFirstCollision()

void WorldObject::MovePositionToFirstCollision ( Position &  pos,
float  dist,
float  angle 
)
2807{
2808 angle += GetOrientation();
2809 float destx, desty, destz;
2810 destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2811 desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * std::sin(angle);
2812 destz = pos.m_positionZ;
2813
2814 if (!GetMap()->CheckCollisionAndGetValidCoords(this, pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ, destx, desty, destz, false))
2815 return;
2816
2817 pos.SetOrientation(GetOrientation());
2818 pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);
2819}

◆ setActive()

void WorldObject::setActive ( bool  isActiveObject)
1088{
1089 if (m_isActive == on)
1090 return;
1091
1092 if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1093 return;
1094
1095 m_isActive = on;
1096
1097 if (on && !IsInWorld())
1098 return;
1099
1100 Map* map = FindMap();
1101 if (!map)
1102 return;
1103
1104 if (on)
1105 {
1106 if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1107 map->AddToActive(this->ToCreature());
1108 else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_DYNAMICOBJECT)
1109 map->AddToActive((DynamicObject*)this);
1110 else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
1111 map->AddToActive((GameObject*)this);
1112 }
1113 else
1114 {
1115 if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1116 map->RemoveFromActive(this->ToCreature());
1117 else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_DYNAMICOBJECT)
1118 map->RemoveFromActive((DynamicObject*)this);
1119 else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
1120 map->RemoveFromActive((GameObject*)this);
1121 }
1122}

◆ SummonCreatureGroup()

void WorldObject::SummonCreatureGroup ( uint8  group,
std::list< TempSummon * > *  list = nullptr 
)

Summons group of creatures. Should be called only by instances of Creature and GameObject classes.

Parameters
groupId of group to summon.
listList to store pointers to summoned creatures.
2381{
2382 ASSERT((GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT || GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT) && "Only GOs and creatures can summon npc groups!");
2383
2384 std::vector<TempSummonData> const* data = sObjectMgr->GetSummonGroup(GetEntry(), GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT ? SUMMONER_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT : SUMMONER_TYPE_CREATURE, group);
2385 if (!data)
2386 return;
2387
2388 for (std::vector<TempSummonData>::const_iterator itr = data->begin(); itr != data->end(); ++itr)
2389 if (TempSummon* summon = SummonCreature(itr->entry, itr->pos, itr->type, itr->time))
2390 if (list)
2391 list->push_back(summon);
2392}

GameObject * WorldObject::SummonGameObject ( uint32  entry,
float  x,
float  y,
float  z,
float  ang,
float  rotation0,
float  rotation1,
float  rotation2,
float  rotation3,
uint32  respawnTime,
bool  checkTransport = true,
GOSummonType  summonType = GO_SUMMON_TIMED_OR_CORPSE_DESPAWN 
)
2318{
2319 if (!IsInWorld())
2320 return nullptr;
2321
2322 GameObjectTemplate const* goinfo = sObjectMgr->GetGameObjectTemplate(entry);
2323 if (!goinfo)
2324 {
2325 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Gameobject template {} not found in database!", entry);
2326 return nullptr;
2327 }
2328
2329 Map* map = GetMap();
2330 GameObject* go = sObjectMgr->IsGameObjectStaticTransport(entry) ? new StaticTransport() : new GameObject();
2331 if (!go->Create(map->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::GameObject>(), entry, map, GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z, ang, G3D::Quat(rotation0, rotation1, rotation2, rotation3), 100, GO_STATE_READY))
2332 {
2333 delete go;
2334 return nullptr;
2335 }
2336
2337 go->SetRespawnTime(respawnTime);
2338
2339 // Xinef: if gameobject is temporary, set custom spellid
2340 if (respawnTime)
2341 go->SetSpellId(1);
2342
2343 if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && summonType == GO_SUMMON_TIMED_OR_CORPSE_DESPAWN)) //not sure how to handle this
2344 ToUnit()->AddGameObject(go);
2345 else
2346 go->SetSpawnedByDefault(false);
2347
2348 map->AddToMap(go, checkTransport);
2349 return go;
2350}

◆ UpdateAllowedPositionZ()

void WorldObject::UpdateAllowedPositionZ ( float  x,
float  y,
float &  z,
float *  groundZ = nullptr 
) const
1557{
1558 if (GetTransport())
1559 {
1560 if (groundZ)
1561 *groundZ = z;
1562
1563 return;
1564 }
1565
1566 if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
1567 {
1568 if (!unit->CanFly())
1569 {
1570 Creature const* c = unit->ToCreature();
1571 bool canSwim = c ? c->CanSwim() : true;
1572 float ground_z = z;
1573 float max_z;
1574 if (canSwim)
1575 max_z = GetMapWaterOrGroundLevel(x, y, z, &ground_z);
1576 else
1577 max_z = ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1578
1579 if (max_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1580 {
1581 if (canSwim && unit->GetMap()->IsInWater(unit->GetPhaseMask(), x, y, max_z - Z_OFFSET_FIND_HEIGHT, unit->GetCollisionHeight()))
1582 {
1583 // do not allow creatures to walk on
1584 // water level while swimming
1585 max_z = std::max(max_z - GetMinHeightInWater(), ground_z);
1586 }
1587 else
1588 {
1589 // hovering units cannot go below their hover height
1590 float hoverOffset = unit->GetHoverHeight();
1591 max_z += hoverOffset;
1592 ground_z += hoverOffset;
1593 }
1594
1595 if (z > max_z)
1596 z = max_z;
1597 else if (z < ground_z)
1598 z = ground_z;
1599 }
1600
1601 if (groundZ)
1602 *groundZ = ground_z;
1603 }
1604 else
1605 {
1606 float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z) + unit->GetHoverHeight();
1607 if (z < ground_z)
1608 z = ground_z;
1609
1610 if (groundZ)
1611 *groundZ = ground_z;
1612 }
1613 }
1614 else
1615 {
1616 float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1617 if (ground_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1618 z = ground_z;
1619
1620 if (groundZ)
1621 *groundZ = ground_z;
1622 }
1623}
